titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the waiting period for disability benefits shall not be applicable in the case of a disabled individual suffering from a terminal illness.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 1/27/1987--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that disability insurance benefits for an individual having a terminal illness shall begin with the first month such individual has such illness.
